## ng-app-edit package

Module that contains a default configuration to run an \[Angular\](https://angular.io/) application against \[Acoustic Content\](https://www.ibm.com/products/watson-content-hub) in edit mode.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [WchNgAppEditModule](./ng-app-edit.wchngappeditmodule.md) | Imports the modules required for inline edit functionality |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./ng-app-edit.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
